title: From Tel Aviv to the occupied West Bank, a highway of denial
subhead: Highway 1 cuts across Israel from west to east, from the Mediterranean Sea to the edge of the Dead Sea, and then into the West Bank. Used by Israeli workers and vacationers alike, the strategic route plays a role in invisibilizing any Palestinian presence.

title: After Alex Pretti's death in Minneapolis, Trump's strategy of stoking tension comes under scrutiny
The burial of Mohammad Mozafari: A rare look into the Iranian regime's crackdown
Gabriel Attal pushes ahead with presidential bid, despite doubts within party
subhead: Criticized internally for his political positioning and strategy, the former French prime minister rejects comparisons with his longtime mentor, Emmanuel Macron.

title: Peter Thiel comes to Paris to speak about the Antichrist
subhead: The libertarian tech billionaire was to speak at the Academy of Moral and Political Sciences on Monday.

title: Eiffel Tower to honor 72 women scientists for posterity
subhead: On Monday, a multidisciplinary commission presented the mayor of Paris with a list of 72 names of women who will join the exclusively male scientists whose names are inscribed on the frieze of the 'Iron Lady.'

title: Richard Ford: 'I tell my European friends how it feels not to understand my country'
subhead: The novelist expresses concern, in an op-ed for Le Monde, about the direction his country has taken under President Donald Trump. He laments that Americans do not appear to pay attention to the erosion of their constitutional rights, nor do they grasp how difficult it will be to turn back.

Footage shows death of Alex Pretti, killed by US Border Patrol in Minneapolis
subhead: The 37-year-old nurse was killed Saturday after federal immigration agents fired at least 10 shots.

title: US seeks to use Alberta to destabilize Canada
subhead: The Trump administration and MAGA circles are closely watching the conservative, oil-rich province, particularly as a separatist movement has launched a campaign to organize an independence referendum.

title: Falling birth rate in France: 'We may be witnessing a period of very rapid and highly gendered social change'
subhead: The decline in the number of births should be seen in connection with the 'gender divergence' between increasingly progressive young women and increasingly conservative young men, observes economist Pauline Grosjean in her column.

title: Immigration: Trump's dangerous strategy of tension
A 'Board of Peace,' to do what?
'The MAGA movement is divided in the face of Trump's openly imperial ambitions'
